creditline: Lent by the Wang Xing Lou Collection
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: porcelain jar, blue and white rim and lower body with iron-red body and foot
medium: Porcelain with underglaze blue and overglaze enamel coral-ground decoration
text: This exquisite little pot would have been on a scholar's desk to hold the water used for writing. The base has a light underglaze blue with a border of sixteen upright lotus petals similar to the neck border. The remainder of the exterior is covered with a brilliant coral-red souffl√© ground.
title: Coral-Ground Water Pot
